div.div:
2. Sends checkpoint once confirmed on Heimdall
(Ethereum Transaction)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 184px; height: 1px; padding-top: 150px; margin-left: 551px;

div.div:
3. Ack if checkpoint is successful, else no-ack transaction
(Heimdall Transaction)
